entries.journal_entry_description: Recover the stolen bio-scanner from the Darkwalkers.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Assault the Darkwalker cave and attack Darkwalker Vindicators.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Assault the Darkwalker cave and attack Darkwalker Guardiols.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The Darkwalkers took a bio-scanner from the crashed shuttle. They were probably also the ones who caused the shuttle to crash in the first place. Find out what they are up to. Start by assaulting their cave near Dee'ja Peak.
entries.task04_message_box_text: From one of the Darkwalker vindicators, you learn that the Darkwalkers hope to use the bio-scanner to make a bomb that will remain inert until its target with the programmed bio-signature is nearby. Then it explodes. It is imperative that you find that bio-scanner.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: The bio-scanner is more than likely being held by the Darkwalker Chief Scientist, Flangolial.
entries.task05_journal_entry_title: Defeat Flangolial, a Darkwalker Chief of Science
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Flangolial did not have the bio-scanner, which leaves only one other possibility: Trienial, the Darkwalker Bloodlord.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Return to Tanoa Vills and give her the bio-scanner you recovered.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Return to Professor Hudmasse and let him know you got the sequencer.
